Name: Ramen
About the game: Ramen Shop Operating Ramen Shop Making delicious ramen noodles Watching customers eat up their favorite dishes And leave an empty plate This is a very happy thing --------------------------------------------------------------------- 1) game is pixel style 2) Exquisite storefront, you are free to set up shopfront. 3) Delicate food styling, from cooking to end table 4) Employing employees and cultivating employees 5) Rich stories, diversified endings Compete with other AI-controlled stores for regional rankings.
